name: Chewbacca
Lore: 'Wookiee smuggler from Kashyyyk. Over 200 years old. Top-notch mechanic and pilot. Jabba has large bounty on this ''walking carpet.'' Friends call him Chewie...or Fuzzball.',
Text: 'Power +1 at same location as Han. Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting Falcon, also adds 1 to maneuver. Your vehicles, starships and droids at same site go to Used Pile (rather than Lost Pile) when they are ''hit.''',
